amendment.description: To change a conveyance date for Coast Guard property in Portland, Maine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5018 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5018 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Snowe. (consideration: CR S9584-9585; text: CR S9584) To change a conveyance date for Coast Guard property in Portland, Maine.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5018 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Snowe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5018 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
